attributes.action: Do not raise the retirement age to 67 due to life expectancy dropping.
attributes.additional_details: Reverse the decision to raise retirement age to 67
attributes.background: Life expectancy has dropped since covid. Review required since it was raised because people were living longer. This is no longer the case...

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Stop the State Pension retirement age rising to 67. Make it 65
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/744450
